content.query:
SELECT TOP 10
       [vendorID],
       [passengerCount],
       [tripDistance],
       [month_num],
       [day_of_month],
       [day_of_week],
       [day_of_hour],
       [totalAmount]
FROM PREDICT (model = (SELECT Model FROM Models WHERE Id = 60), Data = dbo.Trips) WITH (totalAmount float)
